elements.text:
menuitem creates an item in the hamburger menu 
between the 'about' button and the 'Close 
window' button.

id
  Used to identify menu items. Does not 
  currently affect menu item order.
label
  The label on the menu item.
shortcut
  The shortcut to press this option.
  Drawn right justified in the menu.
action
  The function to call when the menu item 
  is pressed.
